RiskApplication.RisksServer

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • RiskApplication.RisksServer.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains code for all communication between Jersey and the database.
    Author:
    Adam Hustwit

      • addProject

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response addProject(java.lang.String pName,
                                                   java.lang.String pmName,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> users)
        Add a new project to project table.
        Parameters:
        pmName - Project manager name.
        pName - Name of project user is attempting to add.
        users - A list of users authorised to access the project.
        Returns:
        A HTTP response message to client. Returns HTTP message with new project ID if project is successful. Otherwise returns HTTP response code 500.

      • updateProject

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateProject(java.lang.Integer pRecID,
                                                      java.lang.String pName,
                                                      java.lang.String pmName,
                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> users)
        Update a project in project table.
        Parameters:
        pRecID - ID of project to be updated.
        pmName - Project manager name.
        pName - Name of project user is attempting to add.
        users - A list of users authorised to access the project.
        Returns:
        A HTTP response message to client. Returns HTTP message with project ID if project is successful. Otherwise returns HTTP response code 500.

      • deleteProject

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteProject(java.lang.Integer pRecID)
        Delete a project from project table.
        Parameters:
        pRecID - ID of project to be deleted.
        Returns:
        A HTTP response message to client. Returns HTTP message with project ID if delete is successful. Otherwise returns HTTP response code 500.

      • listProject

        public static java.util.List<Project> listProject()
        List all projects in project table.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of projects if successful. Otherwise returns null.

      • projectName

        public static java.lang.String projectName(java.lang.Integer pID)
        Get project name by provided project ID
        Parameters:
        pID - Project ID to find corresponding project name for.
        Returns:
        A project name if found, otherwise null.

        public static java.lang.String managerName(java.lang.Integer pID)
        Get project manager name using project ID
        Parameters:

      • addRisk

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response addRisk(java.lang.String rName,
                                                java.lang.Integer impact,
                                                java.lang.Integer probability,
                                                java.lang.String description,
                                                java.lang.String mitigation,
                                                java.lang.String status,
                                                java.lang.String fProject,
                                                Slack lastUpdate)
        Add a new risk to risk event table.
        Parameters:
        rName - Risk name.
        fProject - Project which Risk Event relates to.
        lastUpdate - Slack object used to maintain timer of time since last update.
        Returns:
        A HTTP response message to client. Returns HTTP message with new risk ID and rRecID if new risk is successful. Otherwise returns HTTP response code 500.

      • updateRisk

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateRisk(java.lang.Integer rRecID,
                                                   java.lang.Integer rID,
                                                   java.lang.String rName,
                                                   java.lang.Integer impact,
                                                   java.lang.Integer probability,
                                                   java.lang.String description,
                                                   java.lang.String mitigation,
                                                   java.lang.String status,
                                                   java.lang.String fProject,
                                                   Slack lastUpdate)
        Update a risk in risk event table.
        Parameters:
        rRecID - Risk ID unique for all risks.
        rID - Risk ID unique for all risks within a project.
        rName - Risk name.
        lastUpdate - Slack object used to maintain timer of time since last update.
        fProject - Project which Risk Event relates to.
        lastUpdate - Slack object used to maintain timer of time since last update.
        Returns:
        A HTTP response message to client. Returns HTTP message with rRecID if updated risk is successful. Otherwise returns HTTP response code 500.

      • deleteRisk

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteRisk(java.lang.Integer rRecID,
                                                   Slack lastUpdate,
                                                   java.lang.Integer pID)
        Delete a risk from risk event table.
        Parameters:
        rRecID - ID of risk to be deleted.
        lastUpdate - Slack object used to maintain timer of time since last update.
        Returns:
        A HTTP response message to client. Returns HTTP message with rRecID ID if delete is successful. Otherwise returns HTTP response code 500.

      • listRisk

        public static java.util.List<Risk> listRisk(java.lang.String pName)
        List all risks relating to a project.
        Parameters:
        pName - Project name to return the related risks for.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of risk events if successful. Otherwise returns null.

      • clientAccess

        public static java.lang.Boolean clientAccess(java.lang.String pName,
                                             java.lang.String email)
        Return if a user is authorised view to a project.
        Parameters:
        pName - Project name user wishes to access.
        email - Email address attempting to obtain access.
        Returns:
        Returns true for authorised users and false for unauthorised users.
